name: Movie night
body:
# Movie Night

Yay, movie night! Here's how to get your movie on Plex without anyone else knowing what movie you selected. 
## Download Movie
*To download your movie follow the steps below:*

1. On Sunday morning, visit [http://polskahouse.no-ip.org:5050](http://polskahouse.no-ip.org:5050)
2. Login using the username **polska** and the password **sobieski**
3. Watch this short video to see how to download your movie: 

<iframe width="420" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/L_BaAMefs7w" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

## Final Steps 
1. Immediately send Ryan an iMessage letting him know you attempted to download the movie 
2. 1 - 2 hours later open Plex and browse to the "Movie Night" library, you should see the movie there
3. If you don't see the movie, iMessage Ryan

## IMPORTANT
**Nobody except the person selecting the movie should look in the "Movie Night" library, otherwise you'll spoil the surprise :)**
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
